Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.embed

Interface Memory

All Superinterfaces:
ExternVal
All Known Implementing Classes:
Memory.ByteBufferMemory, Memory.HandleMemory
public interface Memory extends ExternVal
A memory extern.

    Description

    Memory.Bootstrap
    Bootstrap methods for memory load and store invokedynamic instructions.
    static class 
    Memory.ByteBufferMemory
    A memory implemented using a ByteBuffer.
    static class 
    Memory.HandleMemory
    A memory which delegates its calls to the provided method handles.
    static interface 
    Memory.HasOpcode
    Something that has a WebAssembly single-byte opcode.
    static enum 
    Memory.LoadMode
    A type of load instruction.
    static enum

    A type of store instruction.

  • Method Details

    • loadHandle

      MethodHandle loadHandle(Memory.LoadMode mode)
      Get a method handle which loads with the specific mode.

      The handle should accept one integer argument: the memory address; it should return the appropriate type according to the mode.

      Parameters:
      mode - The mode.
      Returns:
      The handle.

    • storeHandle

      MethodHandle storeHandle(Memory.StoreMode mode)
      Get a method handle which stores with the specific mode.

      The handle should accept an integer argument: the memory address, and the value, dependent upon the mode; it should return void.

      Parameters:
      mode - The mode.
      Returns:
      The handle.

    • size

      int size()
      Get the size of the memory, in pages.
      Returns:
      The size.
      See Also:
      • Opcodes.PAGE_SIZE

    • grow

      int grow(int growByPages)
      Grow the memory by a number of pages, filling new pages with 0.

      This operation is allowed to fail (and must fail if the upper limit is exceeded), in which case -1 should be returned.

      Parameters:
      growByPages - The number of pages to grow by, interpreted as an unsigned integer.
      Returns:
      The old size, or -1 if the memory was not grown.
      See Also:
      • Opcodes.PAGE_SIZE

    • init

      void init(int dstIdx, int srcIdx, int len, ByteBuffer buf)
      Initialise the memory with the given data.
      Parameters:
      dstIdx - The destination address in this memory.
      srcIdx - The start address in buf.
      len - The number of bytes to copy.
      buf - The buffer of data.

    • getType

      @NotNull ExternType.Mem getType()
      Description copied from interface: ExternVal
      Get the type of this extern.
      Specified by:
      getType in interface ExternVal
      Returns:
      The type.

    • read

      default byte read(int addr)
      Read a byte at the given address.

      Using loadHandle(LoadMode) and storing the handle should be preferred, since it is quicker and allows for more reading options.

      Parameters:
      addr - The address to read.
      Returns:
      The byte read.

    • write

      default void write(int addr, byte value)
      Write a byte to the given address.

      Using storeHandle(StoreMode) and storing the handle should be preferred, since it is quicker and allows for more writing options.

      Parameters:
      addr - The address to read.
      value - The byte to write.

    • alloc

      static Memory alloc(ExternType.Mem type)
      Create a new memory with the given type.

      This currently allocates a Memory.ByteBufferMemory.

      Parameters:
      type - The type.
      Returns:
      The new memory.
